# thetalake_record (Data Source)

Theta Lake Record Data Source. Retrieves information about a record.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "thetalake_record" "example" {
  id = "rec_12345"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Record ID

### Read-Only

- `comment` (String) Comment associated with the review state
- `content_date` (String) Date of the record content
- `participants` (List of String) List of participants
- `review_state` (String) Review state of the record
